info.title: Bank Frick Webhook Contract
info.description:
This specification describes the HTTP POST requests that Bank Frick
will send to customer-configured webhook URLs.

Customers should implement an HTTPS endpoint that accepts the WebhookPayload structure.
The webhook URL is configured per notification rule and can be any HTTPS endpoint.

WebhookPayloadDto.description: Webhook notification payload sent to customer endpoints

eventDescription.description: Description of the event that triggered the notification

customerNumber.description: Seven-digit customer number at Bank Frick

post.description:
Bank Frick will POST webhook notifications to the URL you configure in your notification rule.

You can configure any HTTPS endpoint URL. The path is entirely up to you.

Example URLs:
- https://your-domain.com/api/webhooks/bankfrick
- https://your-domain.com/notifications
- https://api.your-service.com/v1/incoming-webhooks

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: Signature algorithm used to sign the webhook payload

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: Base64-encoded RSA signature of the webhook payload. Verify using the public key to ensure the webhook came from Bank Frick

408.description: Request Timeout - webhook will be retried

429.description: Too Many Requests - webhook will be retried

500.description: Internal Server Error - webhook will be retried

502.description: Bad Gateway - webhook will be retried

503.description: Service Unavailable - webhook will be retried

504.description: Gateway Timeout - webhook will be retried
